segments.text: What a letdown . I wanted to experience some Mafia culture firsthand .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's worth it just to go and eat what the mafia eat ! The five-dollar tiramisu is a culinary orgasm .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Am I ? Um ... my face gets red when I walk too fast .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You're embarrassed , aren't you ? You gotta loosen up in Little Italy . The lady at the cafe will kiss you when you meet her ...
segments.speaker: S2
